text: I competed in competative robotics from 5th grade, starting with Vex IQ, into middle school with Vex EDR, and my first year of high school with First Robotics. My middle school robotics team won numerous awards for our unique design (see the above video) and went on to compete in the US Open competition. I continue to work in robotics, creating robots from scratch and working with robots in a socially assistive capacity (See SAR under My Work).
